name: Hana Bay - Matte Black - Neutral Grey Polarized Lens

features: Lens: Neutral Grey - Offers the highest available light reduction for the richest colours and sharpest contrast.
Lens Material: MauiPure - Our most popular lens material. It combines optics almost as crisp as SuperThin Glass with ultra lightweight and excellent scratch and shatter resistance.
Shape: Refined rectangular shaped frame best complements oval or heart/triangle face shapes.
Bridge: Saddle style bridge with adjustable rubber nose pads for added comfort.
Finishing Treatment: Three color options available in a high-gloss and matte finish.
Material: Lightweight, injected nylon frame designed for longer wear time.
